.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit BinaryWriter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 将二进制中的基元类型写入流并支持用特定的编码写入字符串。

span.span: Writes primitive types in binary to a stream and supports writing strings in a specific encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供简化将基元数据类型写入流的方法。The class provides methods that simplify writing primitive data types to a stream. 例如，可以使用 方法将布尔值作为单字节值写入流。For example, you can use the method to write a Boolean value to the stream as a one-byte value. 类包含支持不同数据类型的写入方法。The class includes write methods that support different data types. 当你创建类的新实例时 ，你提供要写入的流，并根据需要指定编码的类型以及是否在释放对象后保持流处于打开状态 。When you create a new instance of the class, you provide the stream to write to, and optionally specify the type of encoding and whether to leave the stream open after disposing the object. 如果未指定编码类型，将使用 UTF-8。If you do not specify an encoding type, UTF-8 is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 派生类可以重写此类的方法以指定唯一的字符编码。A derived class can override the methods of this class to give unique character encodings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在文件中存储和检索应用程序设置。The following code example demonstrates how to store and retrieve application settings in a file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 关闭当前的 和基础流。

span.span: Closes the current and the underlying stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的这一实现 `Close` 调用 传递值的方法 `true` 。This implementation of `Close` calls the method passing a `true` value. 除非显式调用或，否则刷新流将不会刷新其基础编码器 `Close` 。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or `Close`. 如果设置为，则 `true` 表示将数据从缓冲区刷新到流，但不会刷新编码器状态。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这样，编码器就可以将其状态保留 (部分字符) 以便它能够正确地编码下一个字符块。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 此方案影响 UTF8 和 UTF7，其中某些字符只能在编码器接收到相邻字符后编码。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters.

summary.span: 清理当前编写器的所有缓冲区，使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备。

span.span: Clears all buffers for the current writer and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有派生类应重写 `Flush` ，以确保所有缓冲的数据都发送到流中。All derived classes should override `Flush` to ensure that all buffered data is sent to the stream. 除非显式调用或，否则刷新流将不会刷新其基础编码器 `Flush` 。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Flush` or . 如果设置为，则 `true` 表示将数据从缓冲区刷新到流，但不会刷新编码器状态。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这样，编码器就可以将其状态保留 (部分字符) 以便它能够正确地编码下一个字符块。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 此方案影响 UTF8 和 UTF7，其中某些字符只能在编码器接收到相邻字符后编码。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. 有关常见 i/o 任务的列表，请参阅 [常见 I/o 任务](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于存在数据格式冲突，因此不建议将此方法用于以下编码：Because of data formatting conflicts, using this method with the following encodings is not recommended: - UTF-7UTF-7 - ISO-2022-日本ISO-2022-JP - ISCIIISCII 有关常见 i/o 任务的列表，请参阅 [常见 I/o 任务](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用内存作为后备存储来编写二进制数据，然后验证是否已正确写入数据。The following code example shows how to write binary data using memory as a backing store, and then verify that the data was written correctly. param.span: 要写入的非代理项 Unicode 字符。

span.span: The non-surrogate, Unicode character to write.

summary.span: 将 Unicode 字符写入当前流，并根据所使用的 和向流中写入的特定字符，提升流的当前位置。

span.span: Writes a Unicode character to the current stream and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the used and the specific characters being written to the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于存在数据格式冲突，因此不建议将此方法用于以下编码：Because of data formatting conflicts, using this method with the following encodings is not recommended: - UTF-7UTF-7 - ISO-2022-日本ISO-2022-JP - ISCIIISCII 有关常见 i/o 任务的列表，请参阅 [常见 I/o 任务](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks). Unicode 代理项字符必须在同一调用中同时写出，而不是单独写出。Unicode surrogate characters must be written out as pairs together in the same call, not individually. 如果在应用程序中需要对代理项对的支持，请考虑使用字符数组和 方法重载。If you require support for surrogate pairs in your application, consider using a character array and the method overload. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用内存作为后备存储来读取和写入数据。The following code example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. [!code-cpp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1/CPP/rwchar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1/CS/rwchar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1/VB/rwchar.vb#1)]

span.span: An I/O error occurs.
The stream is closed.
is a single surrogate character.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Write (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(string value) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Write (value As String)
public: virtual void Write(System::String ^ value);
abstract member Write : string -> unit override this.Write : string -> unit

param.name: value
param.span: 要写入的值。

span.span: The value to write.

summary.span: 将有长度前缀的字符串按 的当前编码写入此流，并根据所使用的编码和写入流的特定字符，提升流的当前位置。

span.span: Writes a length-prefixed string to this stream in the current encoding of the , and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the encoding used and the specific characters being written to the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 长度为前缀的意味着此方法首先写入字符串的长度（以字节为单位），该字符串在用 实例的当前编码编码为流时将以字节为单位。Length-prefixed means that this method first writes the length of the string, in bytes, when encoded with the instance's current encoding to the stream. 此值以无符号整数形式写入。This value is written as an unsigned integer. 然后，此方法会将该多个字节写入流。This method then writes that many bytes to the stream. 例如，字符串 "A" 的长度为1，但使用 UTF-16 进行编码时为;长度为2个字节，因此，用前缀编写的值是2，3个字节写入流，包括前缀。For example, the string "A" has a length of 1, but when encoded with UTF-16; the length is 2 bytes, so the value written in the prefix is 2, and 3 bytes are written to the stream, including the prefix. 有关常见 i/o 任务的列表，请参阅 [常见 I/o 任务](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在文件中存储和检索应用程序设置。The following code example demonstrates how to store and retrieve application settings in a file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `BinaryWriter` 以 little endian 格式存储该数据类型。`BinaryWriter` stores this data type in little endian format. 有关常见 i/o 任务的列表，请参阅 [常见 I/o 任务](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks).

span.span: An I/O error occurs.
The stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关常见 i/o 任务的列表，请参阅 [常见 I/o 任务](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用内存作为后备存储来编写二进制数据，然后验证是否已正确写入数据。The following code example shows how to write binary data using memory as a backing store, and then verify that the data was written correctly. MemberSignature.Value: protected void Write7BitEncodedInt (int value);
.method familyhidebysig instance void Write7BitEncodedInt(int32 value) cil managed
Protected Sub Write7BitEncodedInt (value As Integer)
protected: void Write7BitEncodedInt(int value);
member this.Write7BitEncodedInt : int -> unit
public void Write7BitEncodedInt (int value);
.method public hidebysig instance void Write7BitEncodedInt(int32 value) cil managed
Public Sub Write7BitEncodedInt (value As Integer)
public: void Write7BitEncodedInt(int value);

param.name: value
param.span: 要写入的 32 位整数。

span.span: The 32-bit integer to be written.

summary.span: 以压缩格式写入 32 位整数。

span.span: Writes a 32-bit integer in a compressed format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的整数将 `value` 一次写出7位，从七个最低有效位开始。The integer of the `value` parameter is written out seven bits at a time, starting with the seven least-significant bits. 字节的高位指示在此后是否要写入更多的字节。The high bit of a byte indicates whether there are more bytes to be written after this one. 如果 `value` 适合7位，则只需要一个字节的空间。If `value` will fit in seven bits, it takes only one byte of space. 如果 `value` 不适合7位，则将在第一个字节上设置高位并写出。然后， `value` 将移位7位并写入下一个字节。If `value` will not fit in seven bits, the high bit is set on the first byte and written out. `value` is then shifted by seven bits and the next byte is written. 此过程将重复进行，直至写入整个整数。This process is repeated until the entire integer has been written. 有关常见 i/o 任务的列表，请参阅 [常见 I/o 任务](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](/dotnet/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks).

span.span: The end of the stream is reached.
The stream is closed.
The stream is closed.
